short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Time Genie is a powerful Chrome extension that helps users stay on top of their productivity game with elegant time zone management.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It is a user-friendly new tab chrome extension, that allows individuals who frequently interact with people across the globe to view & manage multiple time zones which can help with scheduling meetings or events accordingly (note, scheduling is not part of this extension). All of this experience is offered whenever you create a new tab in your chrome browser.

Time Genie provides an easy-to-use interface that allows users to customize their time zone settings based on their preferred cities, regions, and countries. It also allows users to add or remove time zones, making it more convenient to manage time differences between multiple locations.

One of the standout features of Time Genie is its ability to display the current time in multiple time zones simultaneously. This feature is particularly useful for individuals who work in different time zones or have clients located in various parts of the world. The tool provides users with an at-a-glance overview of the time in different locations, which eliminates the need to calculate time differences manually especially when day saving time changes happen. This feature also helps users to avoid scheduling conflicts and ensures that they are not contacting individuals during their off-hours.

In addition to its functional features, Time Genie also boasts a collection of stunning background images that feature landscapes from around the world. The images are not only beautiful but also help to create a sense of immersion that adds to the overall user experience. From the Northern Lights in Iceland to the Great Barrier Reef in Australia, the background images of Time Genie are truly mouth-watering and add an extra layer of excitement to managing time zones. With such an aesthetically pleasing design, Time Genie makes time management not only efficient but also enjoyable.

Overall, Time Genie is an invaluable tool for anyone who needs to manage multiple time zones. It is easy to use, customizable, and provides users with a range of features that make it effortless to stay on top of time differences across the globe. Whether you're a business professional, a student, or a frequent traveler, Time Genie is a must-have tool that will save you time and ensure that you never miss an appointment, flight or meeting again.
